content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/nest-controller is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. I should:

1. First explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Check the current pom.xml to see the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17 in pom.xml
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to test the build
6. Fix any issues that arise
7. Keep running `mvn clean verify` until it succeeds

Let me start by exploring the repository structure.

	<properties>
		<java.version>1.8</java.version>

        <configuration>
          <source>1.8</source>
          <target>1.8</target>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
</project>

The issue is that `javax.annotation.Generated` was removed from the JDK in Java 9 and moved to a separate library. In Java 9+, we need to add the `jakarta.annotation-api` dependency. Let me add this dependency:

		<url>git@github.com/bwssytems/nest-ontroller.git</url>
	</scm>

	<properties>
		<java.version>17</java.version>
        <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
	</properties>

            <version>1.3.2</version>
        </dependency>
	</dependencies>

  <build>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.11.0</version>
        <configuration>
          <source>17</source>
          <target>17</target>
          <release>17</release>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.0.0</version>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
</project>
